summary: This script removes the standard touch input device and creates a new dummy input directory with a linked event1 file.

details.comment: This script removes the standard touch input device and creates a new dummy input directory with a linked event1 file.
details.content:
@echo off
adb shell su -c "cd /dev/input \&\& mkdir ../dummy"
adb shell su -c "cd /dev/input \&\& ln -n event1 ../dummy/event1"
adb shell su -c "cd /dev/input \&\& rm -rf event1"
